full_text: ee eae IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2019/KER/1068 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW WEDNESDAY, THE O9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Crl1.MC.No. 214 of 2019 AGAINST CC 419/2018 of J.M.F.C., PAYYANNUR CRIME NO. 227/2017 of Peringome Police Station, Kannur PETITIONER: MAYA DIVAKARAN AGED 32 YEARS, W/O.RAVEENDRAN, CHEMANCHERY PUTHIYA VEEDU, VADAVANTHOOR, MATHIL (P.0O.), KANNUR (DIST.). BY ADV. SMT.K.DEEPA (PAYYANUR) RESPONDENT: 1 STATE OF KERALA REP. BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. 2 N.U. SARAMMA AGED 70 YEARS, W/O.N.S.POULOSE, PAULSONS HOUSE, PRESIDENT, PERINGOME VANITHA SAHAKARANA SANGHAM, ARAVANCHAL, PERINGOME, KANNUR. BY ADV. SURYA.K.P PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI M S BREEZ THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Pa ie ped Elz ro mm Cr1.MC.No. 214 of 2019 2 2019/KER/1068 ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioner is the accused in C.C.No.419 of 2018 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class, Payyannur. She is alleged to have committed the offences under Sections 201, 406 and 420 42=IPC. Second respondent is the President of the Co-operative Society. She is the victim in the case. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the trial court may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner and the second respondent and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. The petitioner was temporary Secretary of the Peringome Vanitha Sahakarana Sangham of which the second respondent is the present Biel Crl.MC.No. 214 of 2019 3 2019 /KERITO68 President. The petitioner allegedly misappropriated certain amount belonging to the Society and cheated it. T have perused the affidavit filed by the second respondent. I am satisfied that the matter has been settled and no public interest is involved in it. There is no legal impediment for quashing the proceedings. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The proceedings in C.C.No.419 of 2018 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class, Payyannur are quashed. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE MC/10.01.19 ee eres Crl.MC.No. 214 of 2019 4 2019/KER/1068 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE I TRUE COPY OF THE RESOLUTION DATED 21/11/2018 PASSED BY THE PERINGOME SAHAKARANA SANGHAM TO THE EFFECT OF TAKING DECISION TO WITHDRAW THE PROSECUTION PROCEEDINGS AGAINST THE PETITIONER. ANNEXURE II CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT OF CRIME NO. 227/17 OF PERINGOME POLICE STATION, KANNUR. ANNEXURE III AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT.
